definition: to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

pinyin: qian2 shui3 zhuang1 bei4 tuo1 lun2 xiang1

sentences.english: The tugboat tugged the freighter into the harbor.
sentences.chinese: 拖輪把貨船拖進海港了。

sentences.english: As it taxied towards the tug the pilot released his torpedo .
sentences.chinese: 飛行員駕機滑向拖輪，隨後投了魚雷。

sentences.english: Harbor tugs are the most typical of the tugboats that people recognize.
sentences.chinese: 港口拖輪是最典型的拖船人們承認。

sentences.english: This Convention applies to sea-going tugs.
sentences.chinese: 本公約適用於海上拖輪。

sentences.english: Tugboat towing ports, no sewage, there is repatriation facilities.
sentences.chinese: 港口有拖輪拖曳，無排污，有遣返設施。

sentences.english: Utopia Aft Station. Make tug fast on main deck on starboard side.
sentences.chinese: 將拖輪在右側主甲板上挽牢。

sentences.english: What materials can be unloaded to the boat?
sentences.chinese: 那些物品可以卸到拖輪上？

sentences.english: As it taxied towards the tug the pilot released his torpedo.
sentences.chinese: 飛行員駕機滑向拖輪，隨後投了魚雷。

sentences.english: Tug boats and launches into the territory available.
sentences.chinese: 船隻入港可獲得拖輪和汽艇。

sentences.english: This invention relates to lubricating oil water content tester of towboat rudder quant device.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種拖輪舵漿裝置潤滑油水分測試儀。

sentences.english: Usingengine as required, ship was assisted by tug for operating.
sentences.chinese: 按需用車，拖輪協助操縱。

sentences.english: Letgo lines and got clear of wharf, assisted by tug on starboard quarter.
sentences.chinese: 解纜，拖輪拖引右舷船尾，離開碼頭。

sentences.english: The provisions of this Chapter shall not be applicable to the towage service rendered to ships within the port area.
sentences.chinese: 本章規定不適用於在港區內對船舶提供的拖輪服務。

sentences.english: Please hoist up a flag "I require a tug".
sentences.chinese: 請掛上一面“我需要一艘拖輪”的信號旗。

sentences.english: A towboat pushes barges down the flood-swollen Mississippi River at Memphis, Tenn.
sentences.chinese: 一艘拖輪在孟斐斯的密西西比河上拖着駁船前進。

definition: to construct by hoisting ready-built components into place
McCain (name)/John McCain (1936-2018), US Republican politician, Senator for Arizona 1987-2018
(of a ship) to strike a reef/(fig.) to hit a snag
